item.title: Creating a Spritesheet
item.description: The Goal The goal of this tutorial is to teach you how to make animations. What is a Spritesheet? Below is a sprite sheet for a character called an “Ember Demon” Now I know that this may look like 4 demons next to each other but it is intended to be one character. I’ve labeled some areas to take note of. The first would be the blue numbers. This is the frame number at each frame.
